00068 GrTexture3D::GrTexture3D( const UPath& name, EFORMAT format, unsigned int width, unsigned int height,
00069                                               unsigned int depth, const void* data )
00070 : GrTextureBase( name, GL_TEXTURE_3D, format, kNoMipMap | kNoCompress, ETT_3D )
00071 , _width( width )
00072 , _height( height )
00073 , _depth( depth )
00074 , _data( 0 )
00075 {
00077         unsigned int dataSize = _elemsPerPixel[ format ] * width * height * depth;
00078         _data = new unsigned char[ dataSize ];
00079         MemCopy( _data, data, dataSize );
00080 
00082         Create();
00083 }
00084

00087 {
00088         delete[] ( unsigned char* )_data;
00089 }
